page.title: 04A WALK IN THE COUNTRY
page.content: Today we went for a walk in the countryside. We walked in deep mud. Richard got his foot stuck in the mud and his boot came off. His sock got all muddy. Herbert jumped off a stile into some mud. He got all splattered. We all laughed at him. We went along the River Wolf to the source, across the fields and up the hill. We found lots of different flowers, especially primroses. We also found a buzzard's wing and a chicken's leg. In Mr. Gush's farm we saw some calves and a puppy. It was good fun, but the countryside was spoilt in some places as there were a lot of rubbish dumps in the stream. We passed several old houses and saw the Nursery School children at the Village Hall. Then we came back to school. Class 2 Ages 6/7 years
